casebody.data:
Sylvester TRAYLOR
v.
Cathy GAMBRELL et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 12, 2018

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 180 Conn.App. 459, 183 A.3d 1212 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
